name: Surveillance Simulator
description:
"Surveillance Simulator"

is a game where you sit in a control room monitoring various surveillance cameras and completing assigned tasks. Currently, there are 10 available monitoring routes, including: parking lot, subway, streets, office building, abandoned warehouse, restroom, and express hotel. Each route has its own unique events, and unexpected changes may occur as the missions progress.



The game includes hidden levels and challenging puzzles, suitable for skilled players who can successfully complete the challenges.

The game simulates surveillance equipment and allows full keyboard operation. When in fullscreen, it feels like you are actually controlling surveillance devices. Complete tasks assigned by the boss using the surveillance equipment, earn dollars, and advance to various other control rooms to explore more surveillance scenarios.
